title: The 5 Best Free Comics
author: VD
content_html:
Fandom Pulse provides the list:

Arktoons is a digital platform by Arkhaven Comics offering free webcomics with diverse genres, with one single agenda: ENTERTAIN! Featuring a range of series, Arktoons provides engaging and entertaining content, including fantasy, science fiction, and slice-of-life, appealing to a broad audience. It provides a springboard for up-and-coming independent creators as well as for allowing for legends of the comics industry to showcase their comics, all the while providing entertainment for you the reader. Here are the 5 best independent comics you can read for free right now.

  1. Chuck Dixon’s Avalon
  2. Alt★Hero
  3. Shotgun Samurai
  4. Flying Sparks
  5. The Hammer of Freedom

Interesting choices. What’s your top five?

DISCUSS ON SG
